channel.title: How to fix multicombat NPC Attacking?
channel.description:
Yeah kinda tired of this, well anyways how to fix this.
I made brimhaven dungeon right now... And made some npcs agressive.. Well the thing is there are alot of dragons i putted in there. Once i get in. They all pile me. I want them to attack one by once like after each other.
Anyways ill hear from you guys
